title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: Treeline again Seriously?! this mode was epic on the rift but fuck that map.
Most annoying part is that you can change the maps and modes on urf and other modes, but not hexakill. Though with a kat on howling abyss, it would take the rarity of hexakills away.
I WANT URF BACK {{champion:238}}
No too much urf will kill ranked queue's
Too much URF kills URF.
Why no doombots? Just wondering if it'll be in the rotation at all.
Hey there, this was answered in the latest Ask Riot post: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/rgm-ip-and-tons-damage-ask-riot
I got an S on Hexakill, however i did not receive a token?
You only get lvl6&7 tokens from normals or ranked SR.

Now that's just not true. I have gotten mastery tokens and all I've played are the featured game modes, it's been many months since my last normal SR game and I have never even touched ranked.  Hell I've got 2 mastery tokens on Teemo and I only played him on Definitely Not Dominion in the past month, so it's not restricted to modes on SR either.

Whether they've been enabled on this mode is another story, but since champion masteries definitely are and the tokens are enabled in other non-SR modes I see no reason why they wouldn't be.
Why is hexa on so much? I'd actually like to play some black market brawlers or doom bots. I loved the doom bots.
They probably haven't retooled all the other modes yet, and Hexakill is probably the easiest to program for.
No hate, but we can have hexakill (on twisted treeline) twice in 4 weeks but not urf? Is urf like ranked lower than hexakill in popularity or something?
I think URF has a bigger drop off in popularity than some other modes if it's consistently available - the more people get used to it the more stale the meta gets.
True, I guess its just to keep us hyped to see when its gonna come out next.
Was amped for this... then i read twisted treeline... Now im like meh CBF

Can the times that comes out 8:00 to 4:00 for more time to play the games
{{champion:26}}

So can you earn mastery 6 and 7 tokens?

Its not clear.
Can only get those on Summoners Rift at this point.

Now that's just not true. I have gotten mastery tokens and all I've played are the featured game modes, it's been many months since my last normal SR game and I have never even touched ranked.  Hell I've got 2 mastery tokens on Teemo and I only played him on Definitely Not Dominion in the past month, so it's not restricted to modes on SR either.

Whether they've been enabled on this mode is another story, but since champion masteries definitely are and the tokens are enabled in other non-SR modes I see no reason why they wouldn't be.

If that's truly the case, then I apologize for my misinformation. I was only relaying what I was aware of based on the Champion Mastery Guide.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5

"You can only earn Mastery 6 and 7 tokens in Summoner's Rift normal and ranked games."

Like I said though, if this has since been changed and the page has simply not been updated, I apologize for the incorrect info. :)

No need to apologize, it seems they have indeed changed them to only be available on normal and ranked SR some time after DND but they communicated it poorly. So yeah they're no longer available through rotating game modes, only through normal/ranked SR.
It's a recent change, you donut

Well you must forgive me for not noticing the change listed in the patch notes, oh wait except it wasn't listed in any patch notes. All they did was put a disclaimer in the Poro King news post saying tokens aren't available through rotating modes, and given the purpose of these posts are to inform players the queue is live it is perfectly reasonable for people to ignore the post especially in the case of a repeat mode. This news post on the other hand lacks any such disclaimer simply saying the same thing previous modes like Definitely Not Dominion (where tokens were available) did. So we have no actual news post saying the change was made, an easily missed one-off disclaimer on Poro King news post about no tokens and no such disclaimer on this one, so yeah it is perfectly reasonable to not know the change had been made.
Could we possibly see Black Market Brawlers as a game mode for the rotation queue sometime soon?
No! That mode is as bad as definitely not dominion...

The map (twisted treeline) of the hexakill sucks but the idea of the mode is good. Love the rotating lineup (only reason I'm still playing this game) as it adds variety. Wish it started a bit earlier in the morning though, being in NZ it is 1pm before its up
Man, and I thought waiting until 11am was bad.
Why hexakill again and not urf
Because if they always had urf ranked will be unplayable for that weekend, urf is limited for this reason
Meanwhile, ARAM gets no love from exciting gameplay variants......

I love all the game modes, particularly Hexakill and URF. The mode changes help keep players interested in League in terms of gameplay. Instead of having just the two game modes over and over, we can now enjoy the other rotating ones if we are getting slightly bored of the others. It keeps me online longer and my friends will often call me to see if I want to play some of the other modes. We get excited about it.

Why hexakill two times in a month? Please change to dominion, preferably on a weekend that overwatch isn't released 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Some modes have only been played once others haven't been played at all and now hexakill will be back for a third time just 3 weeks after its second time. 
rito plz
You need a 10v10 conquest mode, or permanently place URF mode on, all other modes are quite rubbish TBH.
